title: Strange Brew
summaries: The Strange Brew is a potion that is purchased from the Skeleton Merchant during certain moon phases for 5 each. It restores 70–120 health and inflicts 40–70 seconds of Potion Sickness. It also randomly gives 0 / 1 / 2 / 4 second(s) of damage immunity.

statistics.Tooltip:
Side Effects May Include:
-Unpredictable Healing
-Inconsistent Potion Sickness
-Brief Periods of Inexplicable Invulnerability
'It looks and smells terrible'
statistics.Buy: 5
statistics.Sell: 1
